debutant: Be quick and decisive when blocking
Block aggressively against loops that land short and against slow loops
Keep your blocks deep unless you are dead blocking
Block to all three spots - wide corners and opponent's middle, where they have to decide whether to use forehand or backhand
intermediaire: Change directions at the last second
Against faster loops use the opponent's own speed to redirect the ball back aggressively
avance: Learn to change the pace with dead blocks, and perhaps chop and sidespin blocks
Consider learning to topspin your blocks, essentially mini-loops

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice blocking forehands with a focus on pace and direction.

erreurs_a_eviter: Reaching for blocks instead of moving feet
